name: Robot Riot
description: You are manning a scout bot in the vestiges of the age of space exploration and discovery, searching for new planets and alien isles  to search and colonize for the organization you’re working for. Competition is fierce, and some believe there’s almost no area left unexplored. Yet somehow, you find one. Oh, the joy of securing your promotion! There’s only one problem. There’s another scout bot for a different organization, and there’s no room for negotiation when it comes to discovery. Destroyed bots leave no records. Push the competition off into the depths of the abyss and claim the glory!
